name: Fantastic Voyage: Prologue
description: Complete "Fantastic Voyage" and unlock all endings.

name: Archaic Lord of Lightning and Blitz
description: Witness the awesome meteorological power of Bennett's phenomenally bad luck.

name: The Power of Luck
description: Activate the mechanisms and obtain the treasure without making any mistakes.

name: A Line That May Be Crossed
description: Complete "Wellspring of Healing" and unlock all endings.

name: A Maid of Strength and Virtue
description: Complete "Chivalric Training" and unlock all endings.

name: Evil Is Banished
description: Complete "Signs of Evil" and unlock all endings.

name: "...For I Am Duty Bound"
description: Help Noelle discover the source of her strength.

name: Red Hot Chili Popsicles
description: Make a popsicle using the wrong recipe and provoke Chongyun's Pure-Yang Spirit.

name: An Idol's Last Line of Defense
description: Successfully persuade Albert and Barbara's other fans to leave.

name: A World Known Only Unto Roses
Stress Relief
description: Complete "Knightly Exam Prep" and unlock all endings.

name: Invulnerable Maid-Knight
description: Listen to "A Knight's Journey Through Liyue" with Noelle.

name: Diona Special, Stirred, Not Shaken
description: Complete "The Cat and the Cocktail" and unlock all endings.

name: But There's a Catch...
description: Help Diona find a special base drink.

name: Kitten Queen
description: Bring all the cats back to The Cat's Tail.
